description: A customizable button component used to create buttons with different sizes, variants, and types. The component supports a `<slot>` for injecting content within the button, similar to a native HTML button

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color variant of the button.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the button element.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true, the button will be disabled.

properties.name: fullWidth
properties.description: If true, the button will take the full width of its container.

properties.name: pressed
properties.description: If true, the button will be in a pressed state (for toggle buttons).

events.name: buttonClick
events.description: Event emitted when the button is clicked or activated via keyboard.

examples.basic:
<modus-wc-button
  color="${args.color}"
  custom-class="${ifDefined(args['custom-class'])}"
  ?disabled="${args.disabled}"
  ?full-width="${args['full-width']}"
  ?pressed="${args.pressed}"
  shape="${args.shape}"
  size="${args.size}"
  type="${args.type}"
  variant="${args.variant}"
>
  Click me
</modus-wc-button>
